name: Dogolrax
description: You awake on an unknown planet with amnesia. What are those horrific monsters? Who are these mysterious priestesses? Inspired by cult classics such as "Another World", "Flashback" and others, Dogolrax aims to surprise you in ways few games have.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or newer Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or newer Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
